name: Fields of Provence Organic Essential Oil Disinfectant Spray
description:
Fields of Provence Organic Essential Oil Disinfectant Spray is a versatile product that offers multiple uses. It’s an excellent way to incorporate natural cleaning products and aromatherapy into your home and daily routine. Fields of Provence is particularly recommended as a pillow spray to promote better sleep.
This spray can be used to disinfect various surfaces, including couches, rugs, curtains, and decorative textiles. It leaves a pleasant aroma in your space while effectively cleaning.

Before class, spritz the spray on your mat to create a slip-free surface. After a workout, it’s a great way to clean up and freshen up. Additionally, it can be beneficial for skin health, helping to prevent staff infections for those who practice martial arts.

The aroma of the spray is a delightful blend of floral, herbal, relaxing, and grounding notes.

Ingredients: 100% Natural Essential Oils, Witch Hazel, and Water.

Made in Brooklyn
